alert.note: Alert for Pendleton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 12 at 9:48AM EST until January 12 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 AM EST FOR WESTERN BRACKEN...EASTERN PENDLETON AND SOUTH CENTRAL CLERMONT COUNTIES... At 948 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Neville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Moscow, Neville, Chilo, Mount Auburn, Browning Corner, Woolcutt, Neave, Milford, Willow Grove, Bradford, Berlin, Powersville, Lenoxburg, Santa Fe, Kincaid Lake State Park, Peach Grove, Ivor, Foster, Catawba and Johnsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
